item.title: How to Deal with a Finicky Cat: Tips to Make Mealtime More Enjoyable - FurryTails
item.description: How to Deal with a Finicky Cat: Tips to Make Mealtime More Enjoyable Does your cat always turn its nose up at food?

item.title: Is Your Cat Overweight? Top Strategies and Practical Tips to Boost Their Activity - FurryTails
item.description: Is Your Cat Overweight? Top Strategies and Practical Tips to Boost Their Activity Introduction When you notice that your cat is overweight, it’s important to take action.

item.title: Why Do Cats Love Hiding in Small Spaces? Understanding Their Instincts - FurryTails
item.description: Why Do Cats Love Hiding in Small Spaces? Understanding Their Natural Instincts Cats are known for disappearing into the smallest of spaces, whether it’s a cardboard box, under the bed, or inside a closet.

item.title: Can Cats Eat Seafood? Debunking Myths About Cats Eating Seafood - FurryTails
item.description: Can Cats Eat Seafood? Debunking Myths About Cats Eating Seafood Introduction Growing up, we often saw cats in cartoons happily munching on fish, leading many to believe that cats naturally love fish.
